statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_analysis;
SELECT user_id, username, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_analysis;
SELECT user_id, interaction_count FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT username, last_interaction_date FROM user_behavior_analysis ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_behavior_analysis;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, interaction_count FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE interaction_count > 100 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE interaction_count < 50 AND behavior_type = 'scroll' ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, behavior_type, interaction_count, last_interaction_date FROM user_behavior_analysis WHERE interaction_count < 50 OR behavior_type = 'hover' ORDER BY userid ASC, last_interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserBehaviorPatterns ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT username, behavior_score FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_score > 0.5
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM UserBehaviorPatterns ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT post_id, post_content, schedule_date FROM PostingSchedule
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns ORDER BY last_login DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT username, behavior_score FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_score > 0.5 ORDER BY username
SELECT post_content, schedule_date FROM PostingSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2021-10-01'
SELECT user_id, username, behavior_score FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_score < 0.3 AND username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT user_id, username, behavior_score, last_login FROM UserBehaviorPatterns INNER JOIN PostingSchedule ON UserBehaviorPatterns.user_id = PostingSchedule.user_id
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type='click';
SELECT content_id, title, category, publish_date FROM content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, views_count FROM content ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM posting_schedule WHERE schedule_day='Monday' ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type='click' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT content.title, content.category, content.publish_date, user_behavior.behavior_timestamp FROM content JOIN user_behavior ON content.content_id = user_behavior.content_id WHERE content.category='Technology' AND user_behavior.behavior_type='like';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type IN ('view', 'comment') ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT content.title, content.category, content.publish_date, posting_schedule.schedule_day, posting_schedule.schedule_time FROM content JOIN posting_schedule ON content.category = posting_schedule.schedule_day ORDER BY content.publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, content_viewed FROM UserBehaviorPatterns ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT content_type, relevance_score FROM ContentStrategy WHERE relevance_score > 0.7;
SELECT content_id, content_type, posted_date FROM ContentStrategy WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, content_viewed FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT content_id, content_type, relevance_score FROM ContentStrategy ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT content_id, SUM(total_views) AS total_views, SUM(total_likes) AS total_likes FROM PostingAnalytics GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_views > 100;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns;
SELECT user_id, behavior_data FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_data->>'type' = 'click';
SELECT content_id, strategy_details FROM ContentStrategy ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, post_time FROM PostingSchedule WHERE post_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM ContentAnalysis WHERE analysis_result->>'score' > '0.8';
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT behavior_data->>'interaction_type' as interaction_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM UserBehaviorPatterns GROUP BY behavior_data->>'interaction_type' ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT content_id, strategy_details->>'target_audience' as target_audience FROM ContentStrategy WHERE strategy_details->>'marketing_channel' = 'Social Media';
SELECT schedule_id, post_time FROM PostingSchedule WHERE post_time > NOW() ORDER BY post_time ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result->>'sentiment_score' as sentiment_score FROM ContentAnalysis WHERE analysis_result->>'content_type' = 'article';
